last_episode_to_air.name: Hope Never Dies
last_episode_to_air.overview: Alex and Charlie rush to the scene of a mass casualty accident involving a bus full of teenagers.

name: Saving Hope
overview: When Charlie Harris ends up in a coma, he leaves the Hope-Zion Hospital in chaos - and his fiancée and fellow surgeon, Alex Reid, in a state of shock. As the staff of Hope-Zion races to save lives, comatose Dr. Harris wanders the halls of Hope-Zee in "spirit" form, not sure if he's a ghost or a figment of his own imagination.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: In Season 5, as Alex grapples with her destiny, Hope Zion’s doctors are thrust into turmoil as they face new challenges and a new CEO, who threatens to make cuts that may affect the livelihood of the hospital and everything they hold dear.

tagline: Life, death and everything in between.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: In the premiere episode, the Chief of Surgery ends up in a coma, and his fiancée and fellow surgeons fight to save his life.

episodes.name: Contact
episodes.overview: Alex Reid treats a young boy with mysterious symptoms while dealing with the arrival of Charlie's ex-wife. Elsewhere in the hospital, Joel Goran and Maggie Lin try to help a patient who refuses life-saving treatment on religious grounds.

episodes.name: Blindness
episodes.overview: After Charlie’s hand moved in the last episode, Alex has high hopes for his recovery, while she treats a patient who already has multiple surgeries under his belt. Meanwhile, Charlie coaches a young man killed in a roofing accident who has unfinished business with his severely injured brother.

episodes.name: The Fight
episodes.overview: A sleep-deprived Alex takes on a night shift in the ER where an all-star hockey enforcer may be skating full-speed towards an early death. Meanwhile, Charlie meets a suburban punk who is facing the biggest fight of his life.

episodes.name: Out of Sight
episodes.overview: A high profile double hand replantation becomes Alex's (Durance) chance to prove to Kinney (Wendy Crewson) that she is still capable of being Chief Surgical Resident. In the ICU, Maggie (Ross) believes a homeless man may have been misdiagnosed.

episodes.name: The Great Randall
episodes.overview: When a severely injured man under the spell of hypnosis can't remember his identity, the hypnotist who put him under is called into the hospital - where he uses his psychic ability to connect Charlie and Alex.

episodes.name: Consenting Adults
episodes.overview: A routine surgical procedure goes awry when Alex's patient, a soon-to-be-wed young woman, falls into a coma. While Alex struggles with a case that hits close to home, Joel treats a patient who does his own body modifications, and Charlie finds himself drawn to Alex's coma patient in the spirit world.

episodes.name: Heartsick
episodes.overview: With Charlie's life hanging in the balance, Alex and Dawn go head-to-head over who gets to be his legal decision maker - but are forced to put personal matters aside when they scrub into a heart transplant surgery together. Charlie, meanwhile, is in no mood to talk to the heart donor - a deceased prisoner.

episodes.name: Bea, Again
episodes.overview: Charlie’s ex-wife, Dawn, has pulled the plug on his ventilator. All that’s left now is to wait for his breathing to stop. Devastated, Alex vows to stay by Charlie’s side. Meanwhile, Charlie – resisting his death – bumps into Mack MacIlreath, a recently deceased colleague, who has come to help Charlie die. Alex decides to lawyer up and appeal to the Consent & Capacity Board. While the process gets started, Alex is pulled away to meet with a patient: a young woman named Bea, who Alex performed surgery on while working as a first year surgical resident under Dr. Charles Harris. Bea’s check-up is all clear, but Mack and Charlie fear that she was misdiagnosed. And if Alex doesn’t catch it before Bea walks out of the hospital, she could die. Elsewhere, Joel’s hand is broken and he cannot operate until it is fully healed. Stuck with doing consults, he takes the case of a choir singer who makes a “miraculous” recovery from her paralysis.

episodes.name: A New Beginning
episodes.overview: When Joel gets cold feet in the OR, Kinney takes him with her on a Continuing Medical Education assignment in her hometown to help clear his head. During their field trip, a woman gets pinned underneath a truck and Joel and Kinney lead the rescue effort. Meanwhile, Charlie meets a newly deceased therapist who suspects it’s an emotional block that is keeping him in his coma. Encouraged by Charlie breathing on his own, Alex continues her rounds and diagnoses a fitness buff with a rare condition.

episodes.name: The Law of Contagion
episodes.overview: A passenger's illness forces a plane to land; when Alex performs emergency surgery on the patient, she realizes a deadly and contagious virus may have been brought into the hospital.

episodes.name: Ride Hard or Go Home
episodes.overview: A last-resort operation is performed on Charlie, who must confront his past in order to awake from his coma. Elsewhere, Joel leads risky surgery on a female jockey, and Alex could potentially cross a line when working with an Alzheimer's patient.

episodes.name: Pink Clouds
episodes.overview: In the Season 1 finale, Alex confronts game-changing questions following a monumental turn of events. Elsewhere, Joel scrambles to save a patient suffering from a rapidly spreading flesh-eating disease.

episodes.name: I Watch Death
episodes.overview: Alex and Charlie are caught in the middle of a shooting on their way to their first shift back at Hope Zion. In the midst of the commotion, Alex treats a bullied teenager and deals with her own emotions about everything that’s happened in the past year. Meanwhile, Charlie is caught off guard when he realizes that he’s still able to see the spirits of deceased patients. As well, new Chief of Surgery Joel works alongside Charlie’s ex-wife Dawn to perform an intense surgery.

episodes.name: Little Piggies
episodes.overview: Alex must learn to stick up for herself and not be intimidated by Dawn (Charlie’s ex-wife) in order to work alongside her and perform a minimally invasive heart procedure to save a patient’s life. Meanwhile, Joel unlocks a mystery to a young girl’s disease, while getting some advice from Charlie, who is trying to figure out how to help his comatose patient come back from being a spirit. It’s a week of defying the odds at Hope Zion Hospital.

episodes.name: Why Waste Time
episodes.overview: Alex is trying to get her life back to normal with Charlie and at Hope Zion Hosital – but with Charlie’s head in the clouds and the pressure to find her medical niche – she’s struggling. Inspiration comes in the form of an immigrant doctor who needs Alex to save his wife’s life, and in return, helps her find her calling.

episodes.name: Defense
episodes.overview: The doctors at Hope Zion Hospital are forced to deal with people from their past as Alex, Charlie and Joel take on the daunting task of operating on a malpractice lawyer known for suing every doctor in his path. Meanwhile, Zach is tested when the last person he wants to treat comes into his E.R. and a Season 1 patient returns with some difficult insight for Charlie and Alex.

episodes.name: The Face of the Giant Panda
episodes.overview: Alex must become the unlikely advocate for a violent young prisoner brought in to Hope Zion Hospital, while Joel connects with a disfigured refugee and tries to convince Dr. Dana Kinney to come back to operate on him. Meanwhile, a spirit who is familiar to many Hope Zion doctors shows up in the morgue when Charlie is about to do routine procedure.

episodes.name: All Things Must Pass
episodes.overview: After a young, healthy and hunky fireman dies suddenly at Hope Zion Hospital, Alex must take the stand at Hope Zion’s Morbidity and Mortality (M&M) Rounds to find out what went wrong and who is to blame. Meanwhile, Charlie deals with a nervous aspiring Nun, and Joel has to decide if he can be the man that comes through for Sonja.

episodes.name: Bed One
episodes.overview: When a heat wave hits the city, Alex is appointed Trauma Team Leader as the hospital is faced with an influx of patients during a blackout. With no back-up power available, Dawn and Charlie must figure out a way to continue their surgery as Joel and Maggie attempt to keep a patient alive while stuck in an elevator.

episodes.name: Defriender
episodes.overview: When Alex and Joel end up stranded in the middle of nowhere with a severely injured couple, they’re forced to use only what’s around them to stabilize the pair until paramedics arrive. Meanwhile, back at Hope Zion Hospital, Charlie must try to save the wounded leg of his former college roommate as Gavin attempts to help Shahir improve his bedside manner.

episodes.name: Vamonos
episodes.overview: When Alex is forced to put a patient’s gender reassignment surgery on hold, she discovers a secret in his medical history that could save his surgery, but tear his life apart. Charlie deals with a patient who is healthy, sane – and convinced she is going to die at midnight. Meanwhile, Joel secretly helps Sonja deal with a patient of hers who’s been admitted to Hope Zion Hospital.

episodes.name: Wishbones
episodes.overview: When Alex’s brother Luke is admitted to Hope Zion Hospital in critical condition, Joel and Charlie must work together to keep him alive while keeping his admittance a secret from Alex. Meanwhile, Alex figures out a way to remove a tumour from a patient pregnant with twins, while Maggie is thrown off her game by the patient’s gorgeous OB/GYN.

episodes.name: En Bloc
episodes.overview: Alex risks a dangerous surgery on a seemingly inoperable tumor to save a young boy’s life. Meanwhile, Joel struggles with the challenges of being Chief of Surgery as Charlie struggles with the spirit of Alex’s dead brother Luke.

episodes.name: Nottingham 7
episodes.overview: Alex performs surgery on one of the hospital's own doctors; a routine checkup turns deadly; a medical conspiracy extends far beyond Hope Zion.

episodes.name: Wide Awake
episodes.overview: Alex is surprised twice in one night – first when she realizes she's been tricked into a blind double date, and again when she has to rush her mystery man to the ER.

episodes.name: 43 Minutes
episodes.overview: Alex witnesses an accident involving a John Doe; Charlie and Gavin have a spiritual therapy session.

episodes.name: Don't Poke the Bear
episodes.overview: A couple is attacked by a bear, but Alex and Charlie think there's more to the story; a Buddhist tries to teach Joel a lesson.

episodes.name: Breathless
episodes.overview: Alex races to find an organ replacement; Joel helps a couple; Charlie is pushed to his breaking point.

episodes.name: Twinned Lambs
episodes.overview: An elderly patient believes she's living in a different time; Charlie and Joel get competitive; Maggie is forced to take the reins during a surgery.

episodes.name: Broken Hearts
episodes.overview: Alex is diagnosed with an irregular heartbeat but must care for the Great Randall; Charlie deals with the aftermath of the fight; one of the staff is attacked.

episodes.name: Heaven Can Wait
episodes.overview: Alex was stabbed in the chest and Charlie sees her as ghost. Alex realizes she saw her father hang himself. Joel has issues with himself about Alex. Maggie end hers and Gavin's relationship. Alex end up in coma and remains ghost.

episodes.name: Kiss Me Goodbye
episodes.overview: Alex's spirit shares an emotional journey with Charlie in the spirit world. Joel treats a drug addicts necrotic leg and strikes up a unlikely close bond to the patient. Dr. Sydney Katz begins her new job throwing Maggie off her game.

episodes.name: Awakenings
episodes.overview: Alex is awake but still not back to her old self, and Dawn has given strict orders for her recovery plan. Meanwhile, Charlie and Joel square‐off over differing treatment options when two fused-together burn victims are brought into the ER, and Maggie finds herself in a whirlwind of emotions triggered from the fallout of her miscarriage.

episodes.name: Stand By Me
episodes.overview: Alex returns to work for the first time since her stabbing. She is introduced to her buddy colleague, as she returns. Joel ends up involved in a deadly situation at a local street clinic. Gavin shares a euphoric experience, with someone unlikely.

episodes.name: Breaking Away
episodes.overview: A mother and son are brought to the hospital after been involved in a car crash. Alex and Joel discover that the mother needs a transplant, and the son is adamant that he be involved in the operation. Rian and Maggie get caught up in a hazardous situation.

episodes.name: Joel 2:31 (AKA Apocalypse Now)
episodes.overview: Alex, Maggie and Joel face a mystery; Charlie meets a patient with an usual link; an unexpected visitor has Zach questioning his abilities as a dad

episodes.name: The Way We Were
episodes.overview: Shahir and Alex attempt a radical surgery on an Alzheimer's patient; Tom discovers his mentor is keeping a secret; Charlie is torn between Dawn's wishes and the final requests of a dead con-man.

episodes.name: The Heartbreak Kid
episodes.overview: Alex and Charlie perform a double surgery on a teenage girl; Joel works at the clinic; Maggie must pull through when she is reunited with the Zarb family.

episodes.name: The Other Side of Midnight
episodes.overview: Alex and Joel are challenged with a marathon surgery. Charlie has a day off that's full of surprises. Dana, Zach and James are tested.

episodes.name: Days of Heaven
episodes.overview: Celebrated neurosurgeon Thor MacLeod gives Alex an offer; Charlie deals with a fatigued spirit; Joel ends up in a fight at the clinic.

episodes.name: The Parent Trap
episodes.overview: Charlie tries to treat two female MMA fighters; a fight between Dana and Molly ends up in the hospital; Dawn must save a woman's heart.

episodes.name: Hearts of Glass
episodes.overview: Two patients need the same heart; a patient has never-before-seen orthopaedic hardware; Dr. Maggie Lin feels the pressure of the upcoming boards.

episodes.name: Narrow Margin
episodes.overview: Alex encounters a trapped teenager during a hike in the woods; a woman refuses to see anyone but Joel; an exotic dancer comes to the ER.

episodes.name: Trading Places
episodes.overview: Alex and Maggie perform an intricate procedure; Joel thinks his dad is hiding something; Charlie suspects foul-play when he sees a boy and his grandmother.

episodes.name: Remains of the Day
episodes.overview: Alex asks for help in diagnosing a teacher with a mysterious illness; Charlie must explain his actions; Dawn must make a big decision.

episodes.name: A Simple Plan
episodes.overview: Alex and Charlie try to save the life of a man on the run; a spirit won't leave Alex alone; Maggie and Zach try to help a couple; Joel and Shahir help a bride walk down the aisle.

episodes.name: Fearless
episodes.overview: Alex and Dana try to save a single mother's life; a hockey player's mobility is at stake; Charlie gets advice on winning back Alex; Sydney come clean

episodes.name: All the Pretty Horses
episodes.overview: At an off-site army base, Joel and Zach get in a precarious situation; a hypothermia victim fights for the life; Alex, Maggie and Rian write their Surgical Boards.

episodes.name: Sympathy for the Devil
episodes.overview: On her first day back from maternity leave, Dr. Alex Reid has her hands full when a new mother comes in following a car accident.

episodes.name: Beasts of Burden
episodes.overview: Dr. Alex Reid puts her reputation on the line when she questions a senior surgeon’s methods.

episodes.name: Start Me Up
episodes.overview: Alex struggles with being a mom, a surgeon and now mentoring a junior resident.

episodes.name: Miss You
episodes.overview: The man responsible for Alex's brother's drug problem is admitted to the hospital.

episodes.name: Heart of Stone
episodes.overview: A young motocross rider is diagnosed with Leukemia, forcing Dr. Alex Reid to navigate family secrets in order to put her young patient on the road to recovery.

episodes.name: Rock and a Hard Place
episodes.overview: Alex must decide whether or not to use the info Charlie got from a patient's spirit.

episodes.name: Can't You Hear Me Knocking?
episodes.overview: Alex tries to convince Shahir to use an aggressive treatment on a brain tumor patient.

episodes.name: Waiting on a Friend
episodes.overview: When a trapeze artists dies, a line of patients in need of his organs cause complications.

episodes.name: Shattered
episodes.overview: Casualties of a bomb at a local charity run arrive at Hope Zion Hospital.

episodes.name: Emotional Rescue
episodes.overview: Alex discovers that she unknowingly helped the bomber at the expense of a friend.

episodes.name: Shine a Light
episodes.overview: During an ice storm on Christmas Eve, Alex and Dawn fight to keep a woman alive long enough for her family to say goodbye.

episodes.name: All Down the Line
episodes.overview: Faced with a chef who refuses treatment, Alex is forced to confront how she feels about Dana's methods.

episodes.name: Goodbye Girl
episodes.overview: Kristine shows up at the hospital with baby Luke's blanket.

episodes.name: You Can't Always Get What You Want
episodes.overview: Alex and Jeremy try to solve a child's mystery illness; Charlie treats an actor; Maggie reaps the rewards of compassionate medicine.

episodes.name: Not Fade Away
episodes.overview: Charlie decides to go a day without using his special abilities; Alex organizes a trip to Dana's cabin; Zach takes control of a life and death situation involving Dawn's college roommate.

episodes.name: Torn and Frayed
episodes.overview: Alex and Cassie try to free a young woman from her abusive partner; a patient's pacemaker malfunctions.

episodes.name: Anybody Seen My Baby
episodes.overview: Kristine suffers a stroke, which impacts her memory; Alex and Charlie team up to bring her peace.

episodes.name: Let Me Go
episodes.overview: Alex and Shahir struggle to save Charlie's life.

episodes.name: Dr. Dustiny
episodes.overview: While searching for Charlie, Alex finds a caterer who was caught in the crossfire. Grace's mother asks for a priest. Dana consults with Cassie about a male stripper.

episodes.name: Midlife Crisis
episodes.overview: Alex and Charlie are confused about their relationship. Alex and Maggie disagree about a car crash survivor. Dana is forced to treat an injured motorcyclist. Zach bothers Maggie about dating.

episodes.name: Birthday Blues
episodes.overview: Alex makes a promise to a young girl on her birthday. Maggie organizes a surprise party for Alex. Cassie is forced to confront her fear of infectious diseases.

episodes.name: A Stranger Comes to Town
episodes.overview: Charlie tries to save the arm of a man thrown from a horse. Alex joins Manny off-site to help a runaway. A rival from Dev's past arrives at Hope Zion.

episodes.name: Tested and Tried
episodes.overview: Alex tracks down the father of a patient who needs a liver transplant. The new CEO of Hope Zion is at odds with Dawn. Zach faces trials in the E.R.

episodes.name: Doctor Robot
episodes.overview: Alex and Maggie ask Charlie for his opinion on a patient's treatment. Zach is persuaded by a patient while transitioning the ER to an urgent care facility.

episodes.name: Gutted
episodes.overview: Alex and Maggie deal with a tough lawyer after surgical complications with their cancer study patient. With the E.R. now an urgent care facility, Zach and his team aren't equipped to handle an accident victim.

episodes.name: Knowing Me, Knowing You
episodes.overview: Charlie and Manny treat a couple. Maggie evaluates the interns. Billy asks Maggie to be his mentor. Dawn tries to get her Chief of Surgery position back.

episodes.name: All Our Yesterdays
episodes.overview: The doctors rally together to try to save an unknown man who was struck by a subway train. Randal delivers a warning about Charlie's gift. Dr. Sydney Katz returns to town.

episodes.name: Change of Heart
episodes.overview: Alex tries to distract herself from her grief. Charlie and Shahir try to track down Alex's brother. Alex treats a young girl with kidney failure. Maggie and Sydney treat a young woman with an STI.

episodes.name: Nightmares & Dreamscapes
episodes.overview: While Charlie tries to save a young man's life, he is haunted by a mischievous spirit.

episodes.name: Leap of Faith
episodes.overview: Alex and Maggie work together to deliver a baby. Charlie treats a magician.

episodes.name: Problem Child
episodes.overview: Alex tries to help patient who hurt himself breaking into a house. A friend of Dr. Dev Sekara has been beaten by the police; a heart patient wishes to open an animal sanctuary.

episodes.name: We Need to Talk About Charlie Harris
episodes.overview: Alex is challenged about the value of holistic medicine. Charlie's abilities are questioned. Two filmmakers go to Hope Zion Hospital.

episodes.name: Fix You
episodes.overview: The board questions the hospital staff about Charlie's behaviour. A patient convinces Alex to use new-age techniques. Shahir agrees to do an in-utero surgery.

episodes.name: La famiglia
episodes.overview: Alex has to put her concerns for Charlie aside when a chance to perform a cancer surgery arises.

episodes.name: First and Last
episodes.overview: Alex and Charlie put their wedding plans aside. Zach takes a special interest in a case. A coma patient who wakes up with no memory.

episodes.name: Hope Never Dies
episodes.overview: Alex and Charlie rush to the scene of a mass casualty accident involving a bus full of teenagers.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: In Season 5, as Alex grapples with her destiny, Hope Zion’s doctors are thrust into turmoil as they face new challenges and a new CEO, who threatens to make cuts that may affect the livelihood of the hospital and everything they hold dear.
